page.title: 07JAMES LUCAS OF STEVENAGE
page.content: He was a nice man and after his death they named a Wood after him called { {Lucas Wood}and a pub called {Hermit of {Redcoats.}Just down the road, near the woods, is a little pond with{frogs}and {great crested newts}and in the middle of the pond is a big oak tree.It is surprising even though it had oil in the pond that nothing seems to die. {JAMES}lived in the kitchen for the rest of his life.Young children got money from him and the next day the children would come and torment him.In the summer me and my friends play 50-50 in the woods and sometimes make camps.The wood has{ROBINS,RABBITS, {SQUIRRELS}AND OTHER SMALL WILD CREATURES.
